fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Sharp Ears: Pick a player within the first phase of the game. You will be alerted at the end of a phase when they play an attacking card for the first time.
- Persistence: Every 5th attack you play on a single player will become upgraded.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Pounce: Pick a player. If they played an attacking card this phase, Attack! them at the end of the phase. [2 uses, 1 CD]
- Hunt: Pick a player. If they defend against an attack this phase, Attack! them. [2 uses, 1 CD]
- Aggression: Draw a random non-special attacking card. [3 uses, 1 CD]
